title: Lotto results LIVE: Winning numbers for Saturday's £7.2m National Lottery prize
text:
The stakes are high for tonight's Lotto lovers lusting after luxury holidays and dream homes.

A double rollover meant £7.2 million was up for grabs after no one claimed the top prize in the last week's draw.

But no one has won the jackpot once again after the National Lottery balls for Saturday October 26 were drawn tonight.

Camelot says Wednesday's jackpot will rise to an estimated £8.6m as a result.

The winning numbers are: 16, 23, 26, 38, 56, 59 and the Bonus Ball is 32

The Thunderball numbers are: 1, 11, 19, 20, 31 and the Thunderball is 1

Are you the lucky winner?

The Lotto draw is alongside the millionaire's raffle, where one lucky player will win a guaranteed £1m, and 20 winners will walk away with £20,000.

You can buy tickets for a draw at the National Lottery website here up until 7.30pm on the day of the draw

Lottery Tickets cost £2 per line, and include a raffle Millionaire Maker entry code. Thunderball Tickets cost £1.

We will reveal tonight's results, and Thunderball numbers, in our live blow below as they are drawn

Make sure you check back here later to see the winning numbers by following our live blog below.

(Image: Handout)

Follow live updates below...
description: It's a double rollover with a £7.2 million jackpot up for grabs in tonight's UK Lotto and Thunderball draw results
